descriptionForAI: A common inflammatory skin condition affecting hair follicles and sebaceous glands.
keyFeatures: Nodules or cysts in severe cases
textureAndAppearance: Oily skin surface, inflamed lesions, can be painful.

descriptionForAI: A chronic inflammatory condition causing persistent facial erythema (redness).
textureAndAppearance: Sensitive skin, burning or stinging sensation, rough or bumpy texture.
differentialDiagnosis: Acne Vulgaris (Rosacea lacks comedones), Seborrheic Dermatitis.

descriptionForAI: A condition that makes skin red and itchy. It's chronic and tends to flare periodically.
A chronic autoimmune condition that causes the rapid build-up of skin cells.
commonLocations: Skin between nose and upper lip
keyFeatures: Silvery-white scales on top of plaques
differentialDiagnosis: Seborrheic Dermatitis (scales are more greasy and yellow), Eczema.

descriptionForAI: A common pigmentation disorder that causes brown or gray-brown patches to appear on the skin.
textureAndAppearance: Smooth, non-scaly, flat patches of darker skin.

descriptionForAI: An autoimmune condition causing loss of skin color in patches.
differentialDiagnosis: Tinea Versicolor (can be hypopigmented but is fungal and often scaly).

descriptionForAI: A common, inflammatory skin condition that causes flaky scales on an oily base.
keyFeatures: Flakes can be yellowish or white
differentialDiagnosis: Psoriasis (scales are more silvery and plaques are thicker), Rosacea.

descriptionForAI: A pre-cancerous lesion that appears on sun-damaged skin.
keyFeatures: Small, rough, scaly spot or patch
Can be skin-colored, pink, red, or brown
textureAndAppearance: Rough, sandpaper-like texture, better felt than seen.
differentialDiagnosis: Squamous Cell Carcinoma, Seborrheic Keratosis (waxy, 'stuck-on' appearance).

descriptionForAI: A viral infection causing small, fluid-filled blisters on or around the lips.
keyFeatures: Grouped vesicles (small blisters) on an erythematous base
Evolves into pustules, then crusts over
textureAndAppearance: Tingling or burning before eruption, blisters, then a yellow crust.

descriptionForAI: An inflammatory rash involving the skin around the mouth.
commonLocations: Sometimes around the nose or eyes
Characteristically spares the skin border of the lips
keyFeatures: Clusters of small, erythematous papules and pustules
textureAndAppearance: Bumpy, red rash, can be itchy or have a burning sensation.
